Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I've noticed fine wrinkles developing all over my neck, chest, axilla, trunk, back, and upper arms over the past year.
How old are you?

Have you noticed any changes in your skin texture or any other symptoms apart from the wrinkles?
No, I haven't noticed any changes in skin texture or other symptoms; there is no redness, hardening, or thinning of the skin.
Do you have any history of chronic illnesses or are you currently taking any medications?
No, I do not have any history of skin disorders or other significant health problems, and I am not taking any medications.
Is there a family history of similar skin conditions or other genetic disorders?
I haven't mentioned any family history of similar skin conditions or genetic disorders.
Final Diagnosis: Cutis Laxa.
